notesStmt.note: Slight damp entry at edges. Ink burning through in some gatherings (infilled and repaired). Usage stains. Slight worming. Foxing and mould spotting.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each, in greater part provided with signatures at the beginning.
